name: Quickly!
description:
This is a game made for the BTP game jam.

This is a game about a normal platformer, but the health system is inverted. Thanks to my ex-teamate @Wonk for the idea!

Controls and inrtructions:

WASD or arrows to move and jump

If your health is more or equal to 30, you die, keep the health low by dying from the lava.

Touch the yellow blocks, and your health will increase by 2

Health increases by 2 every second

Jump on the boss' head three times for him to die

After killing the boss, go to the start of the levels, then left.

Bugs

There is one "bug" that I have seem right now, after killing the boss, the win jingle repeats four times. sorry for that!

Credits

The credits can be viewed by finishing  the game or pressing credits in the menu.

                                                                   Thanks for playing!
